stimulusHtml: Which of the following is an action a president can take to rally public support for the administration's legislative agenda?
choicesHtml: Use the State of the Union Address to pressure Congress to pass a bill lowering income taxes.
Hold private meetings with key members of Congress to promote a compromise on the budget.
Forge an executive agreement with another country regulating the safety of consumer products.
Sign a bill into law that would provide increased aid to college students.
